jobDescription: Rifiniti provides enterprise business intelligence software to Fortune 500 and other leading global companies, such as Lenovo and Cisco, enabling them to understand how their office space is used, right-size their real-estate portfolios, and redesign their offices to reduce costs and maximize employee productivity, innovation, and satisfaction.  Our web-based software, Optimo, measures actual office space utilization, total cost of occupancy, and employee mobility. Our solution provides not only highly accurate and granular monitoring but also predictive analytics.  Rifiniti is a leading, disruptive SaaS company headquartered in Boston, MA, with offices in Sofia, Bulgaria.
